p.speaker: monsterkid
p.box: *Yo! *Are you sneaking out to see her, too?
*Awesome... *She's the coolest, right!?
*I wanna be just like her when I grow up...
*Hey, don't tell my parents I'm here. *Ha ha.
*OK, I'm ready when you are.

p.speaker: echoflowerexplainer
p.box: *This is an Echo Flower. *It repeats the last thing it heard, over and over...
*Neat, huh?

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *This is an Echo Flower. *It repeats the last thing it heard, over and over...

p.speaker: determination
p.box: *(The sound of rushing water fills you with determination)

p.speaker: sans
p.box: *what? *haven't you seen a guy with two jobs before?
*fortunately, two jobs means twice as many legally-required breaks.
*i'm going to grillby's. *wanna come? Yeah I'm busy

p.speaker: sans
p.box: *OK. have fun.

p.speaker: sans
p.box: > *well, if you insist... *i'll pry myself away from my work

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *(This is a box.)
*(You canput an item in or take a item out.)
*(Why would you, though???) *(You can't use items when they're in the box!)
*(Sincerely, a box hater.)

p.speaker: box
p.box: *Use the box? Yes No

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *I swore I saw something... *Behind that rushing water...

p.speaker: tutu
p.box: *(There's a tutu lying on the ground here.)
*(Will you take it?) Take it Leave it
*(You got the Old Tutu.)

p.speaker: Papyrus
p.box: H... HI, UNDYNE! I'M HERE WITH MY DAILY REPORT...
UHHH... REGARDING THAT HUMAN I CALLED YOU ABOUT EARLIER...
... HUH? DID I FIGHT THEM?
Y-YES! OF COURSE I DID!
I FOUGHT THEM VALIANTLY!
...WHAT? DID I CAPTURE THEM...?
W- W- WELL...
NO.
I TRIED VERY HARD, UNDYNE, BUT IN THE END...
I FAILED.
... W-WHAT?
YOU'RE GOING TO TAKE THE HUMAN'S SOUL YOURSELF...
BUT UNDYNE, YOU DON'T H- HAVE TO DESTROY THEM! YOU SEE...
YOU SEE...
... I UNDERSTAND.
I'LL HELP YOU IN ANY WAY I CAN.

p.speaker: monsterkid
p.box: *Yo... did you see the way she was staring at you...?
*That...
*... was AWESOME!
*I'm SOOOO jealous!
*What'd you do to get her attention...? *Ha ha.
*C'mon! *Let's go watch her beat up some bad guys!

conditions.p: *(A feeling of dread hangs over you...) *(But you stay determined.)

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *When four Bridge Seeds align in the water, thez will sprout.

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *If an error is made, the Bell Blossom can call Bridge Seeds back to where they started.

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *Congratulations!
*You failed the puzzle!

p.speaker: phone
p.box: * Ring...
HELLO! THIS IS PAPYRUS!!!
HOW DID I GET THIS NUMBER...?
IT WAS EASY!!!
I JUST DIALED EVERY NUMBER SEQUENTIALLY UNTIL I GOT YOURS!!!
NYEH HEH HEH HEH!!
SO... WHAT ARE YOU WEARING...?
I'M... ASKING FOR A FRIEND.

conditions.box: SHE THOUGHT SHE SAW YOU WEARING A GROSS BANDAGE
IS THAT TRUE? ARE YOU WEARING A GROSS BANDAGE?
SO YOU ARE WEARING A GROSS BANDAGE
SO YOU AREN'T WEARING A GROSS BANDAGE...
YOU'RE MY FRIEND, SO I TRUST YOU 100-PERCENT
SHE THOUGHT SHE SAW YOU WEARING A FADED RIBBON.
IS THAT TRUE? ARE YOU WEARING A FADED RIBBON?
SO YOU ARE WEARING A FADED RIBBON
SO YOU AREN'T WEARING A FADED RIBBON...
YOU'RE MY FRIEND SO I TRUST YOU 100-PERCENT.
SHE THOUGHT SHE SAW YOU WEARING A DUSTY TUTU
IS THAT TRUE? ARE YOU WEARING A DUSTY TUTU?
SO YOU ARE WEARINA A BANDANNA...
SO YOU AREN'T WEARING A BANDANNA...
YOU'RE MY FRIEND, SO I TRUST YOU 100-PERCENT.

p.speaker: bench
p.box: *It's just a bench.

p.box: *I just wasn't ready for the responsibility

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *A long time ago, monsters would whisper their wishes o the stars in the sky.
*If you hoped with all your heart, your wish would come true.
*Now, all we have are these sparkling stones on the ceiling...

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: * WISHING ROOM

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *Thousands of people wishing together can't be wrong!
* The king will prove that.

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: * C'mon, sis! * Make a wish!

wishingroom.p: *I wish my sister and I will see the real stars someday...

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *Ah... seems my horoscope is the same as last week's...

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *(Ancient writing covers the walls... you can just make out the words.)
*"The War of Humans and Monsters."

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *Why did the humans attack?*Indeed, it seemed that they had nothing to fear.
*Humans are unbelievably strong. *It would take the SOUL of nearly every monster...
*... just to equal the power of a single human SOUL

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *But humans have one weakness. *Ironically, it is the strength of their SOUL.
*Its power allows it to persist outside the human body,

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *If a monster defeats a human, they can take its SOUL.
*A monster with a human SOUL... *A horrible beast with unfathomable power

p.speaker: signpost
p.box: *(It's an illustration of a strange creature...)
*(There's something very unsettling about this drawing.)

p.speaker: ferry
p.box: *Three gold for the ferry *Yes No

conditions.box: *Thanks for stepping on my face. * Here's the 3 gold.

p.speaker: monsterkid
p.box: *Yo... did you see that!?
*Undyne just...
*... TOUCHED ME!
*I'm never washing my face ever again...!
*Man, are you unlucky.
*If you were standing just a LITTLE bit to the left...!

conditions.box: *...yo, did you notice? *She seemed really mad about something!
*She looked liked she was gonna blast me to pieces!
*But... sigh... *Then she decided to put me down...
*Yo! *There's always next time, right? Let's go!
*Yo, don't worry! *I'm sure we'll see her again!

p.speaker: ferry
p.box: *Ahhh... *No umbrellas allowed!

p.speaker: ferry
p.box: *Three gold for the ferry. *Yes No

conditions.box: *Thanks for stepping on my face. *Here's the 3 gold.

p.speaker: cheese
p.box: *This cheese has been here so long, a magical crystal has rown around it.
*It's stuck to the table...

p.speaker: echoflower
p.box: *Squeak.

p.speaker: determination
p.box: *(Knowing the mouse might one day extract the cheese from the mystical crystal...)
*(It fills you with determination.)

p.box: *(It's an odd-looking telescope.)

p.speaker: sans
p.box: * i'm thinking about getting into the telescope business.
*it's normally 50000G to use this premium telescope...
*but... *since i know you, you can use it for free.
*howzabout it?
*(Use the telescope>) *Yes No

conditions.box: HEY! READY TO HANG OUT WITH UNDYNE???
NORMALLY SHE RETURNS AT ABOUT THIS TIME
AND SHE'S NOT ANSWERING HER PHONE

p.speaker: napstablook
p.box: hm... i should probably try to make friends with my neighbors
she's kind of scary,but i feel like i'm always too late to make friends...
i should at least try...

p.speaker: naspstablook
p.box: I've almost got a mix cd finished for my scary neighbor...
it's 74 minutes of people screaming their signature wrestling moves
but they're all autotuned. i hope she likes it
